Text:
How to change the language to english -> Right click Photoshop CS5 in the dock, options -> show in finder.
Go to locales -> folder of the language that you installed -> support files -> right click tw10428.dat -> get info -> change it to tw10428.bak.
doesn't matter which block option I try, it will not go pass the activating screen.  i followed step by step both ways and it never works
Encountered the Problem with there being no option for english. Followed your steps and its working flawlessly!
Yes! It worked! English! :P Thank youuu!

Thanks for the torrent. It works perfect for me.
I have only a doubt. Should I register with an adobe ID? I think I have one Adobe ID.

Brilliant, Thank you so much!!!! It worked perfectly as there was no english option I installed it in spanish and got it to work in english by going to the photoshop file located in applications then finding the locales  folder then  kept opening up the files that was in that until I found tw10428.dat I clicked on it and changed 'dat' to bak. It works a dream, thank you I had to upgrade after upgrading to lion…so happy

it always says my serial #s work but I can never get it to activate... I keep getting "we are unable to start your subscription for Adobe Photoshop CS5 Extended Subscription Edition"  30 day trial ran up and I can't get any further anymore.  What do I do?
Won't activate the subscription. Any help?
It says some of the application components are missing. What to do?
